title: Unnao Rape Survivor to Move Supreme Court Against Suspension of Sengar’s Jail Term
excerpt: The Unnao rape survivor is set to approach the Supreme Court challenging the suspension of Kuldeep Singh Sengar’s jail term. This move highlights ongoing demands for justice in a high-profile case that has drawn national attention.
metaDescription: Unnao rape survivor to petition Supreme Court against suspension of Kuldeep Singh Sengar’s jail term, seeking continued justice and accountability.
author: WebKoya Team

title: BlueBird Block-2 Mission: ISRO Successfully Launches LVM3-M6 Rocket
excerpt: ISRO's BlueBird Block-2 mission marked a significant milestone with the successful launch of the LVM3-M6 rocket. This launch demonstrates ISRO's continued advancements in space technology and its commitment to expanding satellite capabilities.
metaDescription: Discover how ISRO's BlueBird Block-2 mission successfully launched the LVM3-M6 rocket, advancing India's space exploration and satellite technology.
